programme.title: Boo Moon - Casper The Friendly Ghost (1954)
programme.desc: Casper follows a frightened crowd out of a subway station and encounters a man selling views of the moon through a telescope. After scaring off the man, Casper flies to the moon but is captured by tiny moon men who treat him as an enemy until he helps them defend against animated trees and is ultimately embraced as a friend by King Luna and the moon men.

programme.title: The House by the Cemetery
programme.desc: A New England home is terrorized by a series of murders, unbeknownst to the guests that a gruesome secret is hiding in the basement.

programme.title: The House by the Cemetery
programme.desc: A New England home is terrorized by a series of murders, unbeknownst to the guests that a gruesome secret is hiding in the basement.

programme.title: Fred Is Gone Crazy
programme.desc: The scene opens with some strange noises in the background. A voiceover announces that it is front page news. One of the characters seems concerned and confused by this announcement. Another character dismisses them and decides to update their superior on their progress. The lazy characters are given a ten-minute break, during which chaos ensues. One of the characters complains of a conspiracy, while another calls for a red alert. A character named Fred is said to have gone crazy, and everyone is encouraged to run for their lives. The chaos settles down eventually, and one character expresses frustration at being made a fool of. However, their commander reassures them and promises to clear their name. The scene ends with a newspaper article about a big brute who was transformed into a sweety by a little girls love.

programme.title: The Disappearing Gem
programme.desc: The situation may seem challenging, but theres always a way to overcome obstacles. Flame may be unable to use his usual power, but he can still find a solution.

programme.title: Keeping a Promise
programme.desc: Amidst the excitement of Shines live concert, Thunder has pledged to ensure that all security measures are taken care of. However, driven by their desire to return to their home planet, the Buster Gang threatens Shines safety. Will Thunder be able to fulfill his promise and prove himself as a dependable bodyguard? Only time will tell.

programme.title: THE HORROR OF THE DOLLS
programme.desc: A corporation plans to develop a residential tower block into luxury city apartments. As the residents galvanize, the corporation sends in someone to shake them up. The Horror of The Dolls features a strong ensemble cast, inter-twined narratives and an iconic piece of London architecture. The narrative is underpinned by the wealth divide, untouchable high-finance, malleable politicians and the resolve of a community under assault. All wrapped in a blood-soaked and stylized horror thriller set against the breath-taking cityscapes of contemporary London. The Horror of The Dolls is a terrifying, atmospheric and unpredictable journey. Influences on the project are The Shining, Blue Velvet, The Wild Bunch, Short Cuts and Antichrist.

programme.title: WHITE MOSS
programme.desc: The film takes place in the Tundra. With its blizzards and frost, deer and dogs, Nenets people housings, and reindeer teams flying in a white haze... The film describes a story of a young Nenets guy whos fallen in love with a girl since childhood, but she left for the regional center wishing to have a more comfortable life. The main hero struggles between his love and responsibilities to follow the eternal traditions and laws of life in the Tundra, such as survival in the permafrost, reindeer herding, protection of the ancestors, and home against wolves, etc. The movie is about LOVE which implies loyalty, anguish, jealousy ...and finding love in the name of procreation.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 19
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

As of 2021, he has won five National Film Awards, eight Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards, two Filmfare South Awards, and the Amnesty International Italia Award from the 72nd Venice Film Festival.

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: Wheres Kala?
programme.desc: When Kala wants to practise her stealth moves, Gummy and Harry volunteer to help her. Soon Kala is scaring them from various hiding places. After a while the duo doesn’t find Kala anymore, they go too paranoid thinking that Kala is plotting an elaborate scaring plan. Gummy and Harry do all sort of crazy things until they find out that Kala actually went away for her audition in the middle of the game.

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: Zap doubts that Leila is tough enough, but she proves you dont mess with her when Sneevil vacuums up Smightyland and the Smighties.

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: GoGo and UGo are close siblings. While collecting mushrooms, they smell something delicious and find a house made of snacks. When they cheerfully walk in, the two realizes it belongs to a scary wizard.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: FAN-FARE
programme.desc: Its a hot day and the one and only small table fan is the point of all attraction. Chai Raja deftly improvises for himself, but he is extremely concerned that none of his customers should have cause to complain. Sundar, himself too pouring from his pores, ignores his discomfort and sets about switching the blast of breeze (though its a rickety and extremely temperamental old fan) to keep the customers cool. But Basha wants his bit of breeze and is intent to steal the wind from Sundars sails! A tug-of-war for the fan ensues... Basha plays havoc sticking vadas under the fan for wheels and wheeling it off or by hoisting it up with a tricky fishing line. Sundar tries to keep the customers happy by using palm-leaf fans and fanning with all limbs possible...but the customers are too many. And Basha aggravates matters by using the fans breeze to spray paint Sundars body with fruit juice! Sundar chases Basha who smartly propels himself about with the fan, and even blows pillow fluff at Sundar to deter him from the chase. But the last proves to be a bad idea as the fluff sticks in the fan blades, damages it and the rusty things blows up! Scene cuts to show Sundar running behind Basha..but when camera pulls back we see that the two are on a kind of crude treadmill that powers a giant coconut frond wind-mill that lulls breeze at the tea-shop. Chai Raja grins and sloshes tea that forms a smiley with a wink at camera.

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: Surprise Birthday Mix-Up
programme.desc: Twins, Zip and Zap, compete to out-surprise each other with the best birthday party ever, while Villains diguised as a present sneak in to the castle to steal the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Gummys Sick Day
programme.desc: Gummy is feeling under the weather – and, as a finicky, fussbudget patient, soon winds up driving his pals Kala and Harry both sick... of him!

programme.title: Scared
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala watch a scary late-show on TV – and all wind up too scared to go to bed, their imaginations soon running wild...

programme.title: FLYING TEA
programme.desc: The food inspector in in the hotel for an inspection. Juicy jalebis are being fried in the shop and a housefly comes to munch on them. Food inspector is angry and says a fly is a big NO NO. Chai Raja looks at Sundar angrily. Sundar whacks the fly with his towel and throws him out. The defeated fly sadly flies out of the shop, only to be seen by Basha who inspires him, teams up with him and decide to attack the teashop. The duo wreaks havoc in the teashop with tea flying all over the place and jalebis getting thrown all over and the customers going mad with the menacing fly. And the food inspector is visiting again and again to check the cleanliness. Chai Raja is going crazy and he knows that this is all due to Sundars fault. And now poor Sundar has two enemies Basha and the fly! Plus the strict food inspector! Oh o!!!

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: The Star Talers
programme.desc: In the cold winter, the kindhearted girl, GoGo, meets several people who feel sorry for her on her way home. A fairy queen appears in front of a GoGGo that distributes all her clothes and bread and shakes in the cold.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm – and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‘good luck’ will protect him.

programme.title: The Golden Fish
programme.desc: Fisherman GoGo catches the scarce golden fish, I-Go, but frees her. To repay for GoGos kindness, I-Go promises to grant his wishes, and Gogo wishes his greedy wife, WI-Gos longing to be rich.

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia’s annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: Silly Cat
programme.desc: Cat does nothing but just watches tv and lazes on the sofa. And has messed up the tv room with spilled water and popcorn and all things upside down.

programme.title: Cock a Doodle Doo
programme.desc: Keet has a visiting friend from the city -the cocky Rooster. He is a Black Belt Karate champion.

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: Yes Gummy
programme.desc: Feeling a little ‘blah’, Gummy decides to say ‘yes’ to everything that crosses his path. Comic disaster, naturally, soon follows...

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: Catch the Wave
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: The Grasshopper and the Ant
programme.desc: The long, freezing winter has arrived for both the Ants, who worked hard from Spring to Autumn, and the Grasshopper, who sang and played all along.

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: Cat and Keet Went up Hill
programme.desc: GrandPA has taken the trio for a small holiday in the high hills. Its very cold and surrounded by snow. t

programme.title: Gummy’s Little Pet.
programme.desc: Gummy gets a small pet fish with a HUGE appetite – and he, Harry and Kala soon find that feeding this ever-ravenous, ever-growing pet is pretty much a full-time job!

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: GoGo and UGo are close siblings. While collecting mushrooms, they smell something delicious and find a house made of snacks. When they cheerfully walk in, the two realizes it belongs to a scary wizard.

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Street Cats
programme.desc: Cat is king at GrandPA’s house but out on the street it’s a different story. The “Mean Cats” are a local gang of street cats that always pull a fast one on Cat.

programme.title: The Lost Lagoon
programme.desc: After spilling juice on mom’s blanket and not fessing up, Odessa feels guilty. In the Zooniverse, she offers to lead her friends to a lagoon to watch a butterfly dance but doesnt speak up when she loses the map. Never give up, try your hardest, and always tell the truth!

programme.title: Just A Day’s Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: Broken Umbrella
programme.desc: Giving umbrellas a second life with these fascinating ideas

programme.title: Fussy eater
programme.desc: The twins meet a mother dromedary and her child - they have a long trip across the desert ahead of them but the baby is too fussy an eater to have a healthy lunch.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: The North Wind and the Sun
programme.desc: The North Wind and the Sun collide over whos stronger. They set a bet, to see who can make the passing traveler take off his jacket first.

programme.title: Brother Sun and Sister Moon
programme.desc: Late night, GoGo and I-Go wait for their mother who’s at the market selling rice cakes. Meanwhile, her mother gets eaten by a tiger whom disguises as her mother and makes his way to the siblings.

programme.title: Fix it!
programme.desc: The twins visit a world where everything is falling apart, where they meet the frantic "fix-it team

programme.title: You Don’t Say
programme.desc: PANCAKE and ODESSA’S friendship is strained when the young otter unknowingly offends Odessa. In the Zooniverse, Pancake learns a lesson when he and the Zoonicorns picnic in Echo Canyon where hurtful words which turn into irritating little creatures, Words can hurt.

programme.title: Kiwi, flightless birds
programme.desc: When the gods were still ruling the world, when trees and flowers on the ground began to wither due to insects, the goddess WI-Go asks Kiwi to do the hard work of catching insects, and she readily accepts the GoGo.

programme.title: The Palace Garden
programme.desc: Jamillah lands inside a beautiful garden, she encourages Aladdin to come and join her but he warns her to get out, they are the Palace Gardens and shell be locked away if shes found in them! But Jamillah has no way out so Aladdin decides to try and rescue her. He rushes home to Genie but Genie doesnt hear in time so he tries to find a ladder on his own to hop over the fence and save Jamillah. Genie catches up with him just as he gets to the palace walls and realizes that the ladder isnt big enough, so he makes it longer. They climb into the palace only to find Jamillah happy and smiling playing games with the Princess. Soon they are all playing and having fun

programme.title: Non Stop Dance Party
programme.desc: Melody creates a tune so catchy that she puts all the Smighties into a trance. Its up to her to now save the day and stop the villains with her powerful music.

programme.title: The Short Report
programme.desc: Everyone is reading a popular blog gossiping about people at school. When the blog post Brains pictures of aliens, she risks having her secret identity exposed.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: Cryyyy-stal
programme.desc: Its valentine day and Dunky has got a small crystal cupid as a gift for his girlfriend. He has care fully kept it on the table…

programme.title: Gelatina
programme.desc: It is Fridays “Date of Manufacture” (birthday), and Fred tries to make it great. Brains has an emergency when her old, and difficult-to-control pet comes to find her. Gelatina is a gooey blob who can morph into any disguise.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: The Wise Goat of Baghdad
programme.desc: Jamillah brings a pair of walkie talkies to Baghdad. Aladdin loses one in a goat pen and soon the people of Baghdad have gathered to hear the amazing talking goat. Aladdin and Jamillah have fun playing this prank until the Sultan is called to see the amazing sight and the goat breaks one of the walkie talkies. The goat refuses to speak to the Grand Vizier and, feeling foolish, he blames Jamillah for humiliating him. Aladdin calls Genie who saves the day by morphing into the goat and biting the Grand Viziers bottom.

programme.title: The Fly.
programme.desc: A pesky fly won’t leave Gummy alone, and ends up driving him increasingly nuts in his escalating obsession to get rid of it.

programme.title: The Outlawed Cat - Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Sandra and her assistant FO travel into the tale of PUSS IN BOOTS, having been called by the cat. His master, the MARQUIS OF CARABAS, is about to be judged for the theft of a valuable necklace belonging to his fiancée, the PRINCESS. SANDRA and FO must find the necklace and discover the real culprit before the trial ends.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time Part 1
programme.desc: Jamillah arrives in Baghdad for the first time accidently squashing Aladdins eggs causing him to bump into Mustafa, the market trader, and ruin all of his stock. Mustafa wants Aladdin to pay or go to jail but Aladdin has no money and therefore no choice but to go to jail! Can Jamillah and Aladdin think of a way to get him out?

programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Scolymus – The Sorcerer’s Apprentice
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the SORCERER’S APPRENTICE, having been called out by the old sorcerer and mentor in the story. When he returned from his journey, he found his tower full of water, as in the classic tale. But, unlike the story, his APPRENTICE had also mysteriously disappeared. SANDRA will discover that the APPRENTICE has been kidnapped by SCOLYMUS, a sinister spirit invoked by the apprentice to do his work for him.

programme.title: Assaf The Magician – Aladdin
programme.desc: On this occasion, SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of “Aladdin and the Magic Lamp”. The Sultan, the PRINCESS’s father, requires their detective services, as the evil magician ASSAF has returned and has stolen ALADDIN’s lamp. Not content with this, the perfidious magician has ordered the GENIE kill ALADDIN and then take his palace, with the PRINCESS inside, and transport it to his lair, in the distant Atlas Mountains. SANDRA will face the most powerful magician in the Thousand and One Nights with her only weapon: her ingenuity.

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: The Great Manfredi – The Bremen Town Musicians
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the famous tale by the Brothers Grimm, “THE BREMEN TOWN MUSICIANS“, having been called out by the MANAGER of that city’s theatre. Finally, the four musical animals are about to achieve their great dream: to perform in the Bremen Grand Theatre. But a mysterious, dangerous ghost seems to want to prevent this. The fairytale detective and her elf assistant unravel the mystery and confront the Great Manfredi, a cunning magician and illusionist.

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: Cuando seas mío
programme.desc: Nikita apostó con amigos de que Alena se enamoraría de él. La chica le cree, pero pronto Nikita deja a Alena.

programme.title: Cuando seas mío
programme.desc: Nikita apostó con amigos de que Alena se enamoraría de él. La chica le cree, pero pronto Nikita deja a Alena.

programme.title: Cuando seas mío
programme.desc: Nikita apostó con amigos de que Alena se enamoraría de él. La chica le cree, pero pronto Nikita deja a Alena.

programme.title: El ferri
programme.desc: Nadia pierde a su familia cuando es acusada de asesinar al barquero del ferri. ¿Podrá demostrar su inocencia?

programme.title: El ferri
programme.desc: Nadia pierde a su familia cuando es acusada de asesinar al barquero del ferri. ¿Podrá demostrar su inocencia?

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Al Thaman
programme.desc: Director:-Hesham issawi Cast:-Amr Yousef -Saba Mubarak-Year of production:2016

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Its In Our Nature

Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Crave

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: SEHMAT
programme.desc: The story centers around a young woman named Sehmat, who is eagerly anticipating her Muklawa, a traditional Punjabi custom that marks the first meeting between a newlywed couple. Sehmat has been in love with her husband Joginder since they were married as children, and she is excited to finally be reunited with him. However, on the day of their Muklawa, Joginder, who is an army man, is called away to fight in a war. The film then follows the emotional journey of Sehmat and Joginder as they navigate the difficulties of their separation and the choices they must make in the face of war. Joginder is torn between his love for Sehmat and his duty to his country, ultimately choosing to put his country first. This decision leaves Sehmat feeling both sad and proud, as she realizes the sacrifice that Joginder has made for his country. Overall, the film appears to explore themes of love, sacrifice, and patriotism, set against the backdrop of a tumultuous and uncertain time in history.

programme.title: A Haul in One 1956
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto are, believe it or not, pals and partners in a moving company. (Maybe it's because Popeye isn't squinting here.) Anyhow, Olive has made the mistake of hiring them. She hasn't finished packing yet, so the boys, smitten as soon as she answers the door, compete to help her. Once packed, they compete to move more impressive piles of her belongings. Popeye easily wins these contests, even though Bluto locks him in the van at one point. At the end, Bluto socks Popeye into the piano, then into a table; though he hardly seems to need it, Popeye still eats his spinach, then thrashes Bluto.

programme.title: Raiders of Galaxy 1982
programme.desc: A group of young space cadets use a technologically advanced mecha to combat an evil extraterrestrial race that is trying to take over the galaxy

programme.title: Gopher Spinach 1954
programme.desc: Popeye battles a gopher over his precious spinach plants.

programme.title: Lights Fantastic 1942
programme.desc: A tour of the bright lights of New York City, where the various advertising signs come to life.

programme.title: Balloon Land-1935
programme.desc: The inhabitants, including the trees and rocks, of Balloon Land are made entirely of balloons. They come under attack from the evil Pincushion Man. With the help of a quickly inflated army, they manage to fend off the attack.

programme.title: The Song of the Birds-1935
programme.desc: The Song of the Birds-1935

programme.title: Spooky Swabs 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Olive are shipwrecked; they think they are saved when they see a ship, but what they don't realize is that the crew of the Sea Witch is all ghosts, and soon they are under attack, but they don't know from what for a while

programme.title: I'm in the Army Now 1936
programme.desc: To impress Olive, Bluto and Popeye try to convince an Army recruiter to sign him up.

programme.title: Raw! Raw! Rooster 1956
programme.desc: Foghorn's annoying college buddy, Rhode Island Red, comes for a visit and then won't leave. What's worse, he muscles in on Foggy's harem and reverses most of Foggy's traps and tricks. A football session with an exploding casaba melon backfires when Red returns the pass; the exploding golf balls only explode when Foghorn hits them, and the fist in the camera only pops out when Foggy examines it to figure out what went wrong. But Foghorn finally gets the last laugh with a phony telegram about an inheritance and an exploding bowling ball as a parting gift.

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Greek Mirthology 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is trying to get his nephews to eat their spinach, so he tells them about how Hercules (Popeye) defeated a bully (Bluto). Hercules gets his strength by sniffing garlic; he wins numerous tests of strength against the bully until the bully spots him sniffing garlic. The bully pulls out a handy bottle of chlorophyll and douses the garlic, disabling Hercules. He then knocks him into a field of spinach where Hercules discovers a new and better source of strength.

programme.title: Page Miss Glory 1936
programme.desc: A bellhop in the No 1. hotel of a smalltown awaiting the arrival of Miss Glory dreams he has to page Miss Glory at a first class hotel in New York, and this turns out to be a nightmare. Finally he is awakened by the manager, because Miss Glory's car has arrived, but instead of a beautiful lady, a child star a la Shirley Temple steps out ...

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.title: Goo Goo Goliath 1954
programme.desc: An inebriated stork must deliver a baby to a giant at the top of a beanstalk, but doesn't feel like flying that high and instead delivers the baby to a normal-sized couple, who try to raise the giant tot as their own.

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: In the Bag-1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry crash their plane in the cartoon wild, wild west. Surreal hi-jinx involving a vicious outlaw and robbery ensue.

programme.title: Molly Moo-Cow and the Indians-1935
programme.desc: A Native American hunter tries to hunt two ducks. A cow saves them, so the hunter goes after the cow

programme.title: Bowery Blitzkrieg-1941
programme.desc: While a cop steers a kid street-fighter away from being a public nuisance, a petty hoodlum leads a studious kid into a life of crime

programme.title: The Loudspeaker-1934
programme.desc: A young man from a small town heads to New York, determined to become a radio star. He achieves his goal but in the process alienates those around him.

programme.title: His Musical Career-1914

programme.title: Who Saw The Men In Black
Guest LisaRaye
programme.desc: LisaRaye is an icon. She’s been a star since her first film Ice Cube’s The Player’s Club and today she’s on ALLBLK’s A House Divided. She’s an amazing woman and we talk about acting, learning how to be sexy, the time she shot someone, and she cries about her beloved late father. An amazing conversation.

programme.title: Guest Kel Mitchell
programme.desc: Kel Mitchell is famous for making Good Burger and starring on Kenan and Kel but his life in comedy also includes a life in the church. He’s a youth pastor. The church helped him survive a very difficult time in his life where he thought about ending it all. This is a deep convo about his spirituality and his comedy.

programme.title: Guest Aba Blankson
programme.desc: Aba Blankson, Chief Marketing & Communication Officer of the NAACP on Vice President Kamala Harris, the elections, and the continued advocacy of the NAACP.

programme.title: June 27, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for June 27, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest David Alan Grier
programme.desc: David Alan Grier shines as a funny doctor on the new NBC sitcom St Denis Medical. He’s at a point in his career when he only does things he really wants to do. Including this podcast. We talk a lot about his new show and In Living Color and A Soldier’s Story.

programme.title: Portal de Monstruos de H.P. Lovecraft
programme.desc: Una secta está a punto de despertar a la criatura más temida de H.P. Lovecraft...

programme.title: Jack y Jill
programme.desc: Una adaptación terrorífica de la canción infantil Jack y Jill. Un grupo de amigos afligidos por una pérdida reciente se reúnen sólo para descubrir que están siendo perseguidos por Jack y Jill...

programme.title: Krampus 2: El Diablo Regresa
programme.desc: Cinco años después del asesinato de su esposa y la desaparición de su hija, el ex policía Jeremy Duffin es traído de vuelta para ayudar en la caza de un monstruo de Yuletide que castiga a los niños que han sido «traviesos». A medida que el monstruo se vuelve más errático e impredecible, Jeremy descubre la verdad sobre la desaparición de su hija y el destino que le ha deparado una fuente improbable. ¿Podrá Jeremy acabar finalmente con la pesadilla del monstruo navideño que ha aterrorizado a este pueblo durante años?

programme.title: Contención
programme.desc: ¿Qué ocurre cuando estalla una epidemia y no se sabe nada? Puede ocurrir cualquier cosa. Poco a poco, los residentes se dan cuenta de que todos morirán a menos que se unan...

programme.title: Bienvenidos a Jalisco
programme.desc: Un grupo de secuestradores que cuando su líder es arrestado y mandado a prisión, luchan entre ellos para quedarse con el control del grupo y de la ciudad.

programme.title: Dinero Maldito
programme.desc: En esta película les presento una historia muy triste donde un hombre pobre echa a perder su vida al encontrarse un dinero y hacerse rico. me acompañan el gran actor Sergio Reynoso y la guapísima Elizabeth Solís. No se la pierdan.

programme.title: El Tahúr y su Gallo de Oro
programme.desc: Siendo un niño Julián estaba enamorado de la hija del patrón, pero el no le permitía que se acercara a su hija mas que como un empleado. el tiempo pasa y Julián se convierte en un Tahúr poderoso y adinerado. Ahora las cosas serán diferentes.

programme.title: El Tercer Deseo
programme.desc: Eugenio, un corredor de bienes raíces despierta en una esquina de la ciudad con una descomunal borrachera y descubre cerca una desportillada tetera de metal. La toma y manosea a ver si es de plata y, de pronto, se le aparece el espectro de un duende que le sugiere formule tres deseos. El genio desaparece sin dar oportunidad al tercer deseo. Mas tarde, descubre que los deseos le han sido concedidos pero de forma equivocada. La vida de Eugenio se complica, solo anhela reencontrar la tetera abandonada y pedir el tercer deseo.

programme.title: ¡Ni Te Me Acerques!
programme.desc: Él solo tenía que cuidar el hotel y teclear su novela, como Jack Nicholson en “El Resplandor”, pero de buen rollo. Y Llega la cuarentena y se queda le pilla en el Hotel Balneario de Ariño haciendo frente a la paranoia general, el acoso de las fuerzas del orden, las videollamadas de su novia, su madre y del conspiranoico Javi... Todos nos aburrimos mucho en el primer confinamiento. Juan no.

programme.title: Al Acecho del Leopardo AKA Madrid- México
programme.desc: Durante un viaje por la selva mexicana, tres amigos, Román, Patricia y Lorena son testigos de una matanza de campesinos indígenas. Román graba en vídeo la masacre. El Suavecito, el jefe de los asesinos, se da cuenta y mata a Román y a Patricia. Aprovechando la confusión del tiroteo, Lorena logra escapar con la cámara y el vídeo. En su huida se encuentra con un grupo de enanitos toreros que la llevan hasta la ciudad de México. El Suavecito, que no quiere dejar testigos, la persigue implacablemente hasta una enorme plaza de toros, donde en una danza de la muerte, se escenificará la batalla entre el bien y el mal.

programme.title: La Sangre Iluminada
programme.desc: Seis personajes explican su compleja existencia entrelazada. Cada cierto tiempo, debido a matemáticas inexplicables, la vida de estos personajes cambia y ocupan el cuerpo de otro

programme.title: Sanatorio
programme.desc: Rachel y Ryan son dos influencers populares que harán cualquier cosa para conseguir algunos Me gusta más y ganar el próximo desafío virtual.

programme.title: Lucero
programme.desc: Claustrofóbica, demente y puntualmente burlona, “Lucero” no sólo es una perla del fantástico de trinchera sino la enésima prueba de la capacidad de su director para, sin apenas medios y desde los márgenes de una industria fílmica como la española actual rendida al gusto indiferenciado y a la mentalidad de cadena de montaje, generar obras sugestivas, disconformes y estridentes en el mejor sentido.

programme.title: Terror En La Sangre
programme.desc: Unas amigas que van a una fiesta que no existe y reciben un invitado sobrenatural. Un hombre camina por un estacionamiento solitario sin saber que va a encontrar algo espeluznante. Dos chicas invocan a su amiga fallecida. Una esposa que resucita, pero no regresa sola. Una casa habitada por algo que parecen fantasmas. Un hombre que engaña a la muerte. ¿Cuántas manifestaciones sobrenaturales pueden ocurrir en tu ciudad sin que te des cuenta...?

programme.title: A Steady Hand For A Sudden Blessing
programme.desc: In “A Steady Hand For A Sudden Blessing,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that even when we don’t see God moving, His hand still holds us steadily.

programme.title: Dig Until God Does
programme.desc: It will flow when it’s supposed to. In “Dig Until God Does,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us how to plant seeds of faith in the dry seasons of our lives until God brings the rain.

programme.title: I'm Going Through But I'm Running Over
programme.desc: Don’t lose heart. In “I’m Going Through But I’m Running Over,” Pastor Steven reveals that even though you may face adversity, God is with you — and He’s making a way through.

programme.title: Make Peace With Your Strength
programme.desc: In “Make Peace With Your Strength,” Pastor Steven Furtick explains that the strength we have now will become the strength needed for what’s next.

programme.title: Multiply
programme.desc: Are you believing in God for a harvest? In “Multiply,” Pastor Jabin Chavez reminded us that when we sow what God has already given us, we allow God the opportunity to multiply it.
